研究人员警告称，100,000 个工业控制系统在线暴露https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/researchers-warn-of-100-000-industrial-control-systems-expose-online/ Wed, 04 Oct 2023 13:35:40 -0400比尔·图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/researchers-warn-of-100-000-industrial-control-systems-expose-online/ About 100,000 industrial control systems (ICS) were found on the public web, exposed to attackers probing them for vulnerabilities and at risk of unauthorized access. Among them are power grids, traffic light systems, security and water systems. [...]
